packages.manifest:
[package]
name = "AptosStdlib"
version = "1.0.0"

[addresses]
std = "0x1"
aptos_std = "0x1"
aptos_framework = "0x1"
Extensions = "0x1" # TODO: Needed for Prover to instantiate `{{Ext}}` in prelude.

[dependencies]
MoveStdlib = { local = "../move-stdlib" }
